JURISDICTION_ASSIGNMENT_SUCCESSFUL.description: Feedback after the successful completion of a jurisdiction assignment operation

SAVE_AND_ACTIVATE.description: Label of button, which saves a plan with an active status

CANNOT_ASSIGN_TEAM.message: Impossible d'affecter des équipes pour des plans expirés
CANNOT_ASSIGN_TEAM.description: Error message shown when user tries assigning teams to expired plans

NUMBER_OF_STRUCTURES_IN_JURISDICTIONS.message: NOMBRE DE STRUCTURES DANS CERTAINES JURIDICTIONS
NUMBER_OF_STRUCTURES_IN_JURISDICTIONS.description: (in caps) comes before a number that represents a structure count

JURISDICTIONS_SELECTED.description: comes after a number that represents a jurisdiction count

ADJUST_SLIDER_MESSAGE.message: Ajustez le curseur pour cibler automatiquement les juridictions

REFINE_SELECTED_JURISDICTIONS.description: Title of section where user can refine jurisdictions that were previously selected

CONTINUE_TO_NEXT_STEP.description: Label on a button that moves the user to the next step

TARGETED_STATUS.description: Table column header, shows the selection status of a jurisdiction

TARGETED.description: Label for when a jurisdiction is selected

NOT_TARGETED.description: Label used when a jurisdiction is not selected

RESOURCE_ESTIMATE_FOR.description: Label of number that provides an estimated time of completion given a certain amount of resources

STRUCTURES_PER_TEAM_PER_DAY.message: structures par équipe par jour avec
STRUCTURES_PER_TEAM_PER_DAY.description: Label of form field for the number of structures a team can handle per day

NO_JURISDICTION_SELECTIONS_FOUND.description: Info message shown when there are no selected jurisdiction records found

USER_FILTER_NOTIFICATION.message: Filtre utilisateur activé: seuls les plans attribués à %s sont répertoriés.
USER_FILTER_NOTIFICATION.description: Info message to indicate plans are filtered by a specific user

SELECT_OPTION.description: Select one option on a dropdown

SESSION_EXPIRED_TEXT.message: Your session has expired. Please click the link below to login again.
SESSION_EXPIRED_TEXT.description: Info message to notify users their session is expired

RENEW_SESSION_LINK_TEXT.description: Info text for renew session link

SESSION_EXPIRED_ERROR.message: Error: Your session is expired. Please renew session
SESSION_EXPIRED_ERROR.description: Error text flashed when session is expired

CANCELED_PLAN.message: Canceled, no longer going to work

ENTERED_WRONG_ADDRESS.message: Plan has wrong address of patient or source of infection

SAME_SUB_VILLAGE.message: This is patient in the same sub-village and same week

ACTIVITY_DONE_BEFORE.message: Activity was done before the plan was created

LOWEST_JURISDICTION.description: text displayed when user reaches the lowest jurisdiction

ROOMS_COVERAGE_OF_STRUCTURES_SPRAYED.message: Couverture (piéce) par rapport aux structures trouvées
